Class AbstractArchiveScannerPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.buschmais.jqassistant.plugin.common.api.scanner.AbstractScannerPlugin<FileResource,ArchiveDescriptor>

    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ZipScannerPlugin

    public abstract class AbstractArchiveScannerPlugin
extends AbstractScannerPlugin<FileResource,ArchiveDescriptor>
    Abstract base implementation for archive scanners.
